Episodes.Title: Angelina in the Wings
Episodes.Plot: Angelina wants to be the new Sunbeam but the part goes to little Henry. Angelina must overcome jealousy and Help Henry or he will lose the part.

Episodes.Title: Arthur The Butterfly
Episodes.Plot: Angelina finds a butterfly and takes it home. Henry lets it loose.

Episodes.Title: The Gift
Episodes.Plot: Angelina paints a picture for Miss Lilly as a Christmas present, then learns that The Pinkpaws will give Miss Lilly an expensive necklace
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Treasure Tandems
Episodes.Plot: The mouselings vie in a treasure hunt in teams of two. But The Pinkpaws cheats on Angelina and Alice, who vow revenge.

Episodes.Title: Angelina at the Fair
Episodes.Plot: Angelina has to look after her young cousin, Henry at the Fair.

Episodes.Title: The Ballet Tickets
Episodes.Plot: Alice and Angelina miss their chance to get tickets to the ballet dance and their efforts to find a way all fail. But Angelina's father has a big surprise for the both of them.

Episodes.Title: Midnight Muddle
Episodes.Plot: Angelina and her friend Alice accidentally destroy Mrs. Hodge Podge's prize cauliflower. However, Sammy gets blamed for the accident.

Episodes.Title: Miss Lilly is Leaving
Episodes.Plot: Miss Lilly is leaving to teach at a new school. The ballet class is very upset with this news and try to persuade her to stay by giving her gifts and showing her how wonderful the town and her current students are.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Miss Lilly Comes to Dinner
Episodes.Plot: When Miss Lilly comes for a meal Angelina tries to get her mother to impress her with suiytably 'dainty' food...

Episodes.Title: Lucky Penny
Episodes.Plot: Angelina comes across a coin she thinks is a Lucky Penny, helping her regain confidence and neglect her dance practice. Then she loses the coin, but she harnesses enough self-confidence to do the dance perfectly for her audition.

Episodes.Title: Angelina The Mouse Detective
Episodes.Plot: Garden gnomes are being stolen in Mouseland. Inspired by Monty the Mouse Detective, Angelina goes detective. At first she finds nothing but discovers that Mrs. Hodgepodge is secretly mending the gnomes.

Episodes.Title: Angelina and Grandma
Episodes.Plot: Angelina is looking forward to the dress rehearsal but her tutu rips!

Episodes.Title: Two Mice In A Boat
Episodes.Plot: Angelina and troublesome Sammy need to learn how to work together in the boat decorating contest or all of their hopes will be washed downstream.

Episodes.Title: The Costume Ball
Episodes.Plot: Angelina is disappointed she can't join in the adults' costume ball. Mrs. Hodgepodge is babysitting her and Alice. Alice and Angelina dress up as an adult to attend the costume ball, regretting it later.

Episodes.Title: The Legend of Big Paw
Episodes.Plot: Angelina and Henry are camping.  Is a fearsome black cat stalking the hills?
